SEARCH
Package org.mazeApp.model

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
org.mazeApp.model.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
Representation of a graph using an adjacency list. This class represents a graph using an adjacency list, where each vertex is represented by an index and its neighbors are stored in an ArrayList.
Since:
1.0

    • getEdges

      public ArrayList<Edges> getEdges(int vertex)
      Returns all edges (connections) adjacent to the specified vertex. This method finds all edges where the specified vertex is either the source or the destination.
      Parameters:
      vertex - The vertex for which to find neighboring edges
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Edges that are connected to the specified vertex
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the vertex is outside the valid range

    • removeEdge

      public void removeEdge(int source, int destination)
      Remove an edge between two vertices if it exists
      Parameters:
      source - starting vertex
      destination - destination vertex
